* Zyber decided to approach the bot and got up, she walked over and sat down 
only a few feet from him. She looked him over more closely and suddenly 
smelled confusion in his sent. She looked over at the distant herd of 
gazelle then back at Rowdy Wolf, still noticing his discomfort. Then it came 
to her, the reason why he was so nervous!
He thought that she was a real wolf who could talk, she smiled at this.
Zyber straightened her stance.*

" Zyber, Transform!"

* Within seconds she stood in her robot form, her white wolf hair falling 
about her head, shoulders and chest while it also covered her lower arms and 
lower legs, making look as is she were wearing arctic wolf knee-boots.
Zyber bowed her head.*

" Pleased to make your acquaintance, Rowdy Wolf. It is the lack of prey in 
my mountainous home that brings me here, I was hunting when your music 
caught my attention."

* Zyber looked up at Rowdy Wolf, he was a whole 3 inches taller then her. 
Yet, now she could almost feel the tension draining from him, even just a 
little. She guessed that it must either be her peaceful and youthful 
appearance or her size.*
